title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20"! This lightweight hardside suitcase is the perfect travel companion for your next adventure. With a durable ABS hard shell and steel rod construction, this suitcase is built to last.

Choose from a variety of vibrant colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple to suit your style. The 360-degree silent double spinner wheels make maneuvering through airports a breeze. 

With a capacity of 33L, this underseat luggage is ideal for 1-3 day trips. The TSA lock ensures your belongings stay secure, while the interior features like a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps keep your items organized.

Don't compromise on style or functionality - choose the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" for your next journey!
